articles.title: Mozambique : Nearly 100 , 000 Displaced as Violence Spreads Across Northern Moza
articles.summary: Geneva â€” Intensified attacks on villages and the rapid spillover of the conflict into previously safe districts force tens of thousands of people to flee across northern Mozambique, with close to 100,000 displaced in the past fortnight alone, the UN Refugee Agency (UNHCR) says.
